sentences.cn: 一个雾蒙蒙的寒冷早晨

sentences.en: A misty rain in the morning had left behind a coolness that would stay for hours.
sentences.cn: 早上，蒙蒙细雨带来一股清凉之意，数小时不散。

sentences.en: Far in the distance lies the Dongting Lake , a vast expanse of misty , rolling waters.
sentences.cn: 远望洞庭, 烟波浩渺.

sentences.en: He crossed over to the window to see if it was still misty.
sentences.cn: 他走到窗户那儿,看看是不是还有雾霭.

sentences.en: I have only misty memories of my early childhood.
sentences.cn: 我对自己的童年只剩一些模糊的记忆.

sentences.en: It's a bit misty this morning.
Misty it is still, glowing through clouds of dust and reek.
sentences.cn: 苍茫依然, 光辉正穿透尘灰的层云.

sentences.en: My glazed eye wandered over the dim and misty landscape.
sentences.cn: 我的迟钝的眼睛扫视着朦胧迷茫的景色.

sentences.en: She left her eyes growing misty, she saw nothing clearly.
sentences.cn: 她觉得她的眼睛模糊了, 她什么也看不清楚.

sentences.en: The afternoon wore on, turning dark and misty about four o'clock.
sentences.cn: 下午四点钟左右, 天开始变得黑下来,四周起雾了.

sentences.en: The air was cold and misty.
The cold, misty air felt wonderful on his face.
sentences.cn: 雾蒙蒙，寒冷的空气使他脸上感觉很舒爽。

sentences.en: The misty scene had a dreamy quality about it.
sentences.cn: 雾景给人以梦幻般的感觉.

sentences.en: The morning had been misty, verging on frost.
sentences.cn: 早上有雾, 快要结冰了.

sentences.en: They got misty-eyed listening to records of Ruby Murray singing "Danny Boy".
sentences.cn: 聆听着唱片里鲁比·默里演唱《丹尼男孩》的时候，他们泪眼模糊。

sentences.en: They were hanging in the misty clouds.
sentences.cn: 他们漂浮在白茫茫的云端.

sentences.en: Without my glasses everything is just a misty blur.
sentences.cn: 我如果不戴眼镜，看什么都是模模糊糊的。

words.tran_cn: 雾浓地；朦胧地，不清楚地
薄雾；视线模糊不清；模糊不清之物

trans.tran_cn: 多雾的，被雾笼罩的，模糊的，（眼睛）泪汪汪的，无知识的
trans.tran_en: misty weather is weather with a lot of mist

trans.tran_cn: (Misty)人名；(英)米斯蒂，米丝蒂(女名)；(法)米斯蒂
